website_summaries.verdict: One of the best premium breast pump bags that combines useful organization and storage with a more elegant style.
pros: Interior main compartment is large enough to fit virtually any type of portable pump with some room to spare
High quality zippers run up and down smoothly without snagging
Shoulder strap is comfortable to wear
cons: Some found the bag to be so big, it tips over easily

customer_reviews.title: Bag of Pumping Destiny
customer_reviews.text: I think that I probably would have quit pumping as soon as returning to work if it hadn’t been for this bag. I work with a bunch of men at a greenhouse, so my pumping room was a meager accommodation to say the very least. This bag kept things tidy, organized and uncomplicated in my tiny pumping microcosm. The time that I saved by not having to unpack and dig around for things allowed me to spend the maximum time actually pumping, without ruining my relationship with my mostly misogynist coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ventura

customer_reviews.title: What needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Bag design is really smart and it looks classy for work, but the zippers are really tough and take a fair amount of finagling to open and close. When trying to move quickly this becomes a a big pain. The bag also doesn’t maintain its shape well if you have anything in the top but have removed the cooler and pump from the bottom. For the price, these would be details I’d expect to be caught and worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: Very structured bag - perfect for business office
customer_reviews.text: This is a very classy looking bag with amazing function as well. I tried a few different bags before settling on this one. The Jujube Be Prepared is a similar size but it was so sloppy looking. The New Yorker is structured which makes it look so much better in a business environment. I can easily fit my Spectra pump in one bottom section and my medela cooler in the other bottom section. I can also fit my Erin Condren planner as well as a letter size accordion file full of paperwork in the side pockets. It's the only bag I take to work now since the top section is big enough to hold all of my purse-related needs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: "The New Yorker" is large in size and value.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the size and quality of this bag. My friend has a high end juju blu and we compared and contrasted and found that size and quality was better with this bag. I immediately spilled milk the second day using it all over the inside pump pocket but it cleaned up easily with a little soapy water and no smell or stain was left behind. I have already got another one for my friend's baby shower next month. Hopefully, they will come out with different styles and colors in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, practical and doesn’t look like a pump bag!
customer_reviews.text: I kept holding off on buying a bag for my pump thinking it was an unnecessary luxury. I wish I had bought this bag sooner. Holds everything I need for pumping (spectra pump, bottles, bags, etc), my ipad and all of the usual junk I carry in my purse. The straps are wide and sturdy and make carrying this through the airport easy. I’ve consolidated from carting two bags around every day to just this one and couldn’t be more relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This pump bag is great. Very well constructed, strong zippers, large compartments. The bag itself is fairly large - but that's the point - one large bag instead multiple smaller ones. I use the bottom two compartments - one to store the pump, the other to store my cooler with the bottles of milk. The large top area has my nursing bra, phalanges, wipes etc. The other side compartment is large enough for an iPad/ thin laptop and some files. This area is not that big though, so if you need a large bag for your work stuff, might not all fit. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: K. Conti

customer_reviews.title: Truly made for the working/pumping mom.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously impressed with this bag. I traveled with it a week ago and it fit all my purse items, plus my pump and accessories and then my travel cooler filled with pumped milk in baggies. And I feel like there was still room. The only thing i will say is the zippers are a bit tough. They are not easy to close, but I will coat them and it should be fine. I am loving everything about this amazing bag. I know I will use it even after I am done pumping!
customer_reviews.author: CMRH

customer_reviews.title: Best pump bag ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been meaning to write a review for some time now. I've had this bag for over a year now and its the best! Worth every dollar. What stands out about this bag besides its sturdy quality is the pockets. With most pump bags, you can't put much in it because of the pocket for the cooler/pump leaving the middle shallow. Although this bag has the same issue, it has a side pocket for a laptop/notebook, giving me the full depth of the bag. Awesome quality! Stands on its own. Elegant and professional looking. Easy zippers!
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite baby-related purchases!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for a working & pumping mom! I used it pretty much daily for two years (and found ways to fill pump area when I didn’t need it anymore) and the bag still looks and works great. I could bring all my pumping stuff and still cart around my laptop and work related papers back and forth from home and when I had to travel for work. It was great to only need one bag no matter where I needed to go! And again, very durable and high quality!! No complaints from a long time user.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bag! Perfect Size too
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pump bag! I debated on this bag because of the price. After checking out all the other bags on amazon I decided on this one due to the compartments and the extra room for my laptop and iPad. Due to my job, I work 12 hours and have to take multiple bags to my work place. That will no longer be the case with the Charlie G bag. I’m pretty sure I’m going to continue to use this bag even when I am done pumping due to all the room and very very professional look! Also this bag is not too big at all, just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me. But fits the spectra s1
customer_reviews.text: I really did not like how this bag seperates the top compartment from the bottom. This does not allow me to use a taller cooler bag for full sized bottles like other bags do . I really wanted to love this bag as the Spectra s1 slides in so perfectly and easily but I went with the Kalyan bag instead so I could fit my taller cooler bag
customer_reviews.author: Foreverjaded

customer_reviews.title: I love this pump bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this pump bag! I travel a lot for work and this bag makes it so easy to pump anywhere. Before I bought this bag I was starting to feel like a crazy bag lady in the morning between my pump bag, my purse, my lunch box, my cooler, and my brief case. This bag combined everything for me, except my brief case (laptop is too bulky). The only negative thing I can say about this bag is the zippers are a bit difficult to open and close. You really have to pull hard and use both hands to maneuver the zipper to close. I absolutely love this bag despite my issue with the zippers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality pump bag
customer_reviews.text: When I received my new Spectra breast pump, I realized that I would need a special bag to travel with it. This bag easily fits my pump, pump parts, wipes, milk bags, cooler, 14 inch laptop, cellphone, iPad, chargers, and other small items that I need for work. It does get heavy with all this, but it is so much better than carrying multiple bags. The fabric is thick and sturdy. The handles are also nice and sturdy feeling. I am impressed with the quality of this bag and look forward to travelling with it. It is pricey, but I think that it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Joy Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for the Spectra S2
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for the Spectra S2 pump (and I tried a lot of bags before settling on this one). Nice, professional look. Love that no one knows I am carrying around a pump. Suggestions: I knocked off a star because I would love to see the pump and cooler pockets be collapsible so that you can use the bag for other purposes when you don't need to carry your pump. A luggage/trolley sleeve would be nice too.
customer_reviews.author: ilovelucy

customer_reviews.title: Holds spectra and parts fickle zippers
customer_reviews.text: Over all a great bag. Took off one star because the end zippers are fickle and the bag it self is limp. If you have anything in the top compartment and take your pump or pump parts out the bag collapses. I grind my spectra and 3 sets of pump parts in the lower parts of the bag. I do have to carry a separate cooler for milk and my lunch. But I does hold my cleaning wipes laptop and planner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is perfect for going back to work. I fit my laptop, pump, cooler, pump parts, wallet, 3 different adapters (wall, car, and battery), my Erin Condren planner, my quick clean wipes, nipple cream, cell phone, car keys, pump bra, and lunch all in this bag!!! It is a very large bag so I keep a clutch in it for quick trips out to eat on my lunch break. With everything in it, it can get very heavy but seems to be holding up very well with the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Audria Leader

customer_reviews.title: This bag is very nice. I can fit all of my stuff for ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very nice. I can fit all of my stuff for the work day inside. What I do not like is the bag collapses when either your pump or cooler are not in the bottom compartments. I take my cooler out during day and keep in a fridge so eventually stopped using the bottom compartment for cooler and just used for spareness pump parts, snacks, and other seldom used items.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Big!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised this bag received such good reviews. The bag is way too big! I wanted something I could use for work but this is ridiculously oversized so I wound up stuffing everything into my Medela bag when I needed to travel outside of the office. Additionally the compartment layout made it difficult to fit in much beyond the pump and bottle bag, which is counterintuitive considering how large the bag is. The zippers were also tough to close and seemed cheaply made. Luckily I found the Dr Brown Bag and although I’d like it in black, it’s a much more functional option.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefirefly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Spectra!
customer_reviews.text: Best breast pump bag hands down! I bought others but returned them after seeing how awesome this one is! Get itwith the Sarah Wells Cold Gold and Pumparoo and you will be set to pump anywhere! I have used this at work, while traveling, in the car, on an airplane... etc. it works great! The pump can just live in the bag and doesn’t even need to come out! I have a Spectra S1.
customer_reviews.author: katiekatheryn

customer_reviews.title: Working/Nursing Mom Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: I’m not going to lie. It’s BIG. I’m 5ft tall, and I feel like I’m carrying a massive bag. HOWEVER, it’s perfect. I went back to work 3 weeks ago, and I’ve been feeling like a ‘bag lady.’ I have my computer bag, my purse, my pump bag, and my lunch/milk cooler bag. Now, I just use this bag, and my lunch/cooler bag. It literally fits everything except the kitchen sink. I can fit my pump, bottles, accessories, laptop, notebook, wallet, sunglasses, power cords, and there’s still room to spare. Best purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant to buy because of price but glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Huge bag! I was hesitant to buy because of price but glad I did. Before this bag I found myself toting around 3-4 bags and a lunch bag to and from work. With this bag I can bring my spectra pump, work laptop and other necessities to and from in one bag! Love it! Only thing I could complain about would be the zippers are chunky and hard to open but they do there job and keep things in. I would buy again and recommend to other working and pumping mothers
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Practical & Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this bag. It is perfect for my spectra S2 and gives me plenty of space for my cooler, work laptop and important papers, along with room to carry my wallet and other personal items. I have received so many compliments on this bag. I love having the convience of only carrying around one bag (no one wants to be crazy multi bag lady). Love style and being practical??? Then this bag is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Mini DOESNT fit Spectra
customer_reviews.text: I really wish they’d just advertise that the mini doesn’t fit the Spectra 1/2 pumps. It’s the most popular pump right now, they should know better. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: I like it...
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag, but it isn't as great as all the reviews made it seem. The zippers are kind of cheap and they don't zip/unzip easily at all. Also, I assumed there was an insulated area to store pumped milk, but there isn't. I just put an insulated lunch box into one of the compartments, which isn't a big deal. Overall I like it. I used to lug around a few different bags and now everything can fit into one, which is nice. Not 5 stars worthy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crappy quality zippers
customer_reviews.text: I so badly wanted to love this bag, it had everything I was looking for! But upon opening it, testing the bag (didn’t even get to use it), the zippers were horrible. So cheap, they got stuck multiple times... one time with my pump in the bag and I freaked out thinking I was going to have the break the zipper to get it out and wouldn’t be able to return it. For the price, it should be MUCH better quality. I returned the bag unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Ahoek12

customer_reviews.title: I am no longer the bag lady because of this bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing! I’ve been using it for a week now and I really wish I had this with my first baby. I have reduced from 4 bags to one when I go to work. The zippers on the sides are a little sticky but not enough to make me love this bag any less. It’s cute and stylish plus it fits papers I need to grade, my laptop, my pump and all my supplies (Medela Freestyle), my lunch, and my 48 oz water bottle. Yes it is heavy but so was 4 bags, so I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: BEST Pumping Bag EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing! I have taken two trips with it so far and will use it as my daily pumping bag for work at the office. I wanted something stylish but effective and THIS IS IT! Very high quality and room for my pump, cooler, parts, snacks and anything I would throw in my purse. If you are a working/traveling Mom this may be your best investment you make!
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this bag, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I had to make an exception for this bag because I LOVE IT. I used to go to work with 4 bags: my pumping bag, my purse, my work bag and my lunch bag. Now, I go with one. This is large enough to fit it ALL in. It's awesome and makes my life as a breastfeeding, pumping, working mother SO much easier. The bag is big, know that so you don't get overwhelmed by it. If you need a pumping bag - pick this one - don't even hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca B

customer_reviews.title: A tight fit
customer_reviews.text: It is a very classy and nice looking bag. It does not remind me of a typical Mom pumping bag. I was a bit disappointed with the size. It does fit my spectra pump, cooler, and pumping accessories. Unfortunately it does not fit much more. All the zippers and way to modify the center helped some. Overall, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold structure as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: (from my daughter) Although a decent bag, not what I expected for the money. The zippered compartments holding the pump and ice packs frequently get stuck and when I'm in a time crunch, pumping multiple times a day, this is frustrating. Another reviewer showed comparison pictures of this bag and another I was looking into and I'm now wishing I went in another direction. Since I asked a couple of people to split the cost for this birthday gift, I was hoping it'd meet my needs a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Waibel

customer_reviews.title: Best pump bag I've seen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely in love with this bag! I get questions about it all the time from people not even realizing it's a pump bag. It fits and hides my Spectra and all the parts easily, with extra space for all my work items. I recently spilled my water bottle in the top portion and it was completely waterproof and didn't leak into the bottom at all. It's easy to travel with and carry with the different strap options. I will probably continue to use it even after I'm done with the pumping stage!
customer_reviews.author: BethB.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag for pumping at work. It looks like a very large purse and works with my good clothes. Pockets on bottom fit my cooler and spectra s2. Pocket on top fits all my other pump stuff. The laptop section works when I need to bring my laptop with me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for working/pumping mamas!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been a lifesaver! It is heavy, but that’s because it’s a large bag. The design is great, I am able to fit my Medela pump and tubing in one side and my coldpack/bag with my milk in it on the other side. The other compartments are large enough to hold my folders for work and my water bottle and coffee thermos. The bag gets quite heavy with everything in it but I’d be carrying the same amount of weight around regardless, just with multiple bags. Also, it’s cute and does not look at all like a pump bag. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Best pump bag around!
customer_reviews.text: I carry this bag every day to and from work and conferences. It has held up like new for the last 5 months. Lots of storage space for everything I need. I have recommended it to every expecting mom I know who plans on pumping when they go back to work. The only issue I have had is that the zippers can stick at times, but it is a minor hassle compared to the quality and utility of this bag. Love my New Yorker!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E Simpson

customer_reviews.title: stylish must have for carrying EVERYTHING to work
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag for return to work! It easily fits my Medela Pump in Style and cooler, along with everything else I schlep to work including snacks, water bottle, umbrella, folders, chargers etc--and it all fits in one stylish bag so I *look* like I have it all together. Plenty of pockets to keep things organized. My only complaint is that the zippers are a bit stiff.
customer_reviews.author: HalfSlant

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great, fits my large S2 and cooler with plenty of room. It's easy to clean and has very high quality straps that I'm not worried about breaking like on other work bags. I use it daily for all of my pump and work items. I did have an issue with the inner mesh pocket to rip, but they sent me a new bag immediately! I've already recommended this bag to several other working mom's to be.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fits my wife's Ameda Pump perfectly
customer_reviews.text: After getting a hand me down pump from her sister, I wanted to get my wife a nice bag before she went back to work. After searching around Amazon a bit I came across this bag. It was a bit of a splurge but my wife seems to absolutely love it. I was most concerned about the size of it after it arrived as she is a small woman, but she doesn't seem to mind as it fits everything she needs and more. She has an Ameda pump that sits easily in the lower compartment along with her cooler bag. Money well spent....major husband brownie points earned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pump Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is PERFECT. Like the other reviews have mentioned, it's huge, but in the best way. It fits everything I need to pump at work and has tons of different compartments for all the other stuff I have to carry to the office every day, so it's the ONLY bag I need to carry at all. It is very well constructed, sturdy, and stylish in an understated way. I love all of the gold accents. The bottom compartments are perfect for my pump on one side and my 4-bottle cooler bag in the other. For size reference I have the Medela Sonata Pump. Highly recommend this bag- cheaper than many of its competitors and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nontra

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice work bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice work bag. I've only used it a couple of months but it seems like it will hold up really well (with past bags, the issue has always been with the straps giving out or fraying). There is plenty of room for pump and supplies on the bottom, lunch & other supplies on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Clark

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Yesss. Finally a bag that can carry all my stuff. This is really worth the money. Easily fits my PISA, cord, tubes, and flanges, bottles, etc in the two lower compartments. Then the entire upper portion is available for normal stuff - wallet, makeup bag, even a pair of flats would easily fit. And THEN you can still put your computer in! It’s amazing. If you are on the edge and plan on pumping for any amount of time just get this. So worth it. Zippers are stiff but high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect back-to-work bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag made my wife's transition back to work less stressful. She really seems to like the look of the bag and how it keeps her organized despite it being pretty large. She actually bought two bags and returned the other one even though it was a lot cheaper (much to my disappointment :) ). Glad she is happy though. Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Worth It for the Working Momma
customer_reviews.text: This bag is an excellent pump bag for the working professional. I've received many comments from coworkers, and nobody knows it is a pump bag! I read many reviews before making this purchase. I haven't had any problems with zippers, and I don't think it is too large. I like that it is easy to carry my laptop as well. If you plan to pump for several months, this is a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three different bags for going back to work and ended up keeping this one even though it was the most expensive. The material is heavy duty and still professional looking. It fits all my pumping things, all my stuff for work and my small clutch. Only reason I gave 4 stars is bc the zippers aren’t smooth when opening and closing. Kind of hard to zip.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This bag has made my life SO MUCH easier. ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag has made my life SO MUCH easier. I went back to work (teaching) in December and was carrying around three separate bags - one for my pump, one for my laptop and my purse. Now I am able to fit everything in one bag with room to spare. The side compartments are really convenient - one side holds my Medela PISA and the other my cooler. A side flap holds my laptop and papers I need to grade, and the main compartment has my wallet and other items. The bag is really well made and I've received several compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Howarth

customer_reviews.title: Great size, like compartments
customer_reviews.text: Love that this bag holds so much. I have the spectra 2, which is larger. I cal carry that, 4 bottles, my computer and work notebooks a book and other daily necessities. The pockets make it easy to find what you need.
customer_reviews.author: magpalumbo

customer_reviews.title: A pump bag that doesn’t look like a pump bag
customer_reviews.text: I work in a male dominated industry so the style of this bag is perfect for being as discreet as possible. Also works well in the airport when you need to quickly remove the cooler. It’s a lot to spend for a bag you will only use pumping, but when you are bfeeding/pumping I think ANYTHING that makes the process easier is WELL worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Makes travel so much better. Fits perfectly under the plane seat as long as it's not over packed. Fits both my specta and medella pump and the accessories needed. It's not waterproof lol found out the hard way. So maybe make sure all lids are tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Browning

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bag
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag. Fits so much and all of my pump supplies neatly. I was able to cut down time during my overall pumping sessions because I didn't have to take the actual pump out of the bag. Also, I didn't need to use the workplace fridge. I just kept ice packs in one of the insulated sides and that is where I kept my pump supplies and milk and they stayed cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag!! I use it everyday when I go to work and I travel! Seriously so much better to have this bag when I need pump parts for over 30 hrs plus while working 24 hr shifts! Yes it’s a little large but in a good way!! I can’t believe I didn’t have this right when I started breast feeding/ pumping!
customer_reviews.author: Megsterleigh

customer_reviews.title: This bag is so nice! It's huge and it's heavy when it's full
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so nice! It's huge and it's heavy when it's full, but pretty much anything that has to carry a laptop and fit a spectra s1 pump has to be. I find myself almost wishing it were bigger or having dedicated pockets for pumping parts, but it still feels like the best bag out there. Definitely recommend it if you're looking for a pump bag for work.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I bought tote for a shower gift for my niece ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought tote for a shower gift for my niece, a teacher who plans on pumping at school. She called to thank me again for the gift-she loves the bag, especially its size and many compartments that will help keep her organized.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA BRINKMANN

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bag. It is very large, but holds her pump, small cooler, lunch, pumping accesories, and more. Again a very large bag but she absolutely loves it! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, Discreet, & very Functional
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this pump bag. It's gorgeous and discreet. The side pockets are great - my Spectra S2 fits perfectly, as does my cooler in the other side pocket. Tip - if you have the Medela cooler it can fit sideways in the side pocket and your bottles will still fit upright in the cooler on its side. During the first week I had trouble with the side zippers as many reviews say, but this is the end of my second week with the bag and the zippers are much smoother now. I resisted getting a pump bag at the beginning and I should have done it all along. TOTALLY worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I went from carrying 4 bags to 1 - it's a large bag for sure, but it serves its purpose. As previous reviews mentioned, the zippers can be tough and once you take the pumping stuff out of the bottom, the bag doesn't stand up as well. But that really doesn't bother me. I have received several positive comments on the look of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: ad123

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Attractive. Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I like the attractive black and gold design. Sturdy construction. Many pockets. It's big, but it has to be in order to fit everything you need to pump at work!
customer_reviews.author: Harrow

customer_reviews.title: i want to love this bag
customer_reviews.text: i want to love this bag. fits my spectra s1 and a cooler in the bottom compartments and fits multiple sets of flanges and bottles in the top compartment. but the zippers are horrendous. they get stuck easily and you have to fight with them a bit to get them to work. you’d think for $125 they would stick some decent zippers on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Allison S.

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and bad zippers
customer_reviews.text: This bag is attractive and has lots of pockets to hold your laptop, phone, wallet, keys, pump, and pump parts discreetly ... or as discreetly as one can look carrying such a large bag. My complaint is that the zippers stick. After using the bag for about three months, one of the side pockets is tearing at the zipper seam. I decided to buy a smaller pump (Spectra S9) and so now I really don't need a specialty bag. If I were to buy a bag again, I would probably buy a nicer work bag that can convert into a backpack. This thing is just too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Wong

customer_reviews.title: If you're a pumping, working mom, BUY THIS BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bag!! It holds my pump, cooler with bottles, wallet, and my lunch! It's so convenient to only pack and carry one bag! The quality is outstanding. The zippers were slightly stiff at first but loosened up with use and I have no issues at all now. My only complaint is that I wish I would have bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for travelling with pump
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use, I love this bag! The compartments are the perfect size, and I've been able to haul sets of pump parts, a cooler, my laptop, and other essentials easily. The bag material is nice and the handles are great. The zippers do get stuck time to time, but overall the bag has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Please upgrade to better zippers!
customer_reviews.text: This was almost the bag for me, but the zippers are tough to manage. Knowing that I'd always be rushing while pumping, I didn't want to add time to the task by fussing with the zippers to get into the dual insulated storage compartments. Otherwise, the bag would have worked for me. Please upgrade to better zippers!
customer_reviews.author: DCCorgi

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag!!! It fits my S2 breast pump perfectly, as well as baby bottle cooler on the other side perfectly! I can even fit my work laptop in the side sleeve. I will def be using this as my pump bag at work IN STYLE 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great discrete bag for a working mom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag at a great value. It is very large, which is what I was looking for so I didn't have to carry several bags with me to work. It fits my pump, bottles and the rest of my work supplies easily. The customer service has been very good so far. I got an email from the company following up with my purchase and making sure I was satisfied with the product, which led me to write this review. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Patti T.

customer_reviews.title: Functionality at its best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how big this bag is, but roomy enough to accommodate my fridge to go cooler, freestyle medela, and separate container for my pump parts! Functionality at its best! My daughter is about to arrive anytime now and I've experienced how hard it is to carry 3 bags all at the same time. This is one product I will use for the rest of my breastfeeding journey... We'll update once i start using them again...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This bag makes pumping at work so easy. At first I thought it looked too big, but it's actually perfect. It discreetly fits all my pumping needs, plus everything I would normally carry in a purse. I like that both my pump and cooler fit conviently in the side pockets. A huge bonus is that there's more than enough room to fit the Charlie G Wet/Dry bag too! Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It holds everything I need, including my laptop and pump. I went from 3 bags (laptop bag, pump bag, cooler) to 1. So much easier to and from work! Quality is excellent, it’s stylish and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bag but way too big
customer_reviews.text: This bag is lovely and well-made, as a lot of the reviews say. The variety of pockets for pump parts and personal items is great. But as a number of reviews note, it's just HUGE. I'm a taller person and it just looks overwhelming on me. I could see traveling with it, but can't imagine bringing it to work on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Great pumping bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits larger pumps like S2 and is a great work bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest bag for pumping stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest bag for pumping stuff. Even if your not working, this is bag has been my life saver!!! I stay organized and have everything with me. My computer, pumping stuff, wallet and more!!! Its worth every penny, i would recommended this bag to everyone! and not to mention its so stylish!!!! love it love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: annabel amato

customer_reviews.title: Large and in charge!
customer_reviews.text: Mine just arrived and I was able to fit my spectra plus laptop, whooo hoo!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Weis

customer_reviews.title: I love how it's quality material and feels professional
customer_reviews.text: I love how it's quality material and feels professional. Holds spectra pump perfectly and all the necessary parts with more than enough room for laptop and items. Can't believe I was lugging around two bags for so long before finding this one.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and practical, what more can you ask?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. Nice and roomy. Super practical. Very elegant. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Surface Pro 3 User

customer_reviews.title: Awful zippers - dealbreaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag - good size and classy... but the zippers are awful! For a bag whose sole function is something that can quickly and easily be unzipped, this was a dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Heather HS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag. Only potential drawback is that compartments only ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag. Only potential drawback is that compartments only really work for carrying a pump and a milk cooler - couldn't really use for other functions after nursing is done. Great quality and very beautiful, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Zippers
customer_reviews.text: Horrible zippers, cheap material. I was expecting a quality bag at this price point. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Q

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice and BIG
customer_reviews.text: Using for twins. It’s nice and BIG! I decided to use it as my every day bag and has been working out great!
customer_reviews.author: Cicily Thimmig

customer_reviews.title: The quality and look was great, but it was too boxy for me
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because it just felt too bulky. The quality and look was great, but it was too boxy for me.
customer_reviews.author: LizG

customer_reviews.title: ... and sadly I was sent a backpack (which was nice just not what I was looking for) not the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my New Yorker bag for my return to work and sadly I was sent a backpack (which was nice just not what I was looking for) not the bag :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the style and the bag has perfect amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and the bag has perfect amount of storage compartments. Zippers are difficult to close side pockets. Otherwise great bag.
customer_reviews.author: RsE hDlGo

customer_reviews.title: Huge and tippy
customer_reviews.text: WAY too big and the hardware felt cheap. It was also very tippy. I returned the bag and am going to go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for all your needs.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far with my bag. The reviews i read before purchasing all said how great the quality of the bag was and they are right. It came very quickly via prime, less than 36 hours from order. The actual bag is large but has been working great as a carry all on our daily trips to visit my mother. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but huge
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality but huge!!! With pumping gear, laptop, notebook, and wallet it was so heavy I felt like I was carrying luggage. If you're looking for an extra large bag this is great, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Cepparo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I searched for so long for a bag that I would be able to carry my pump supplies and work supplies. I looked through a few different reviews and decided this seemed like the best option, but unfortunately I was wrong. I have only carried this bag to work one day and the stitching is coming apart. For the price tag I expected a longer use than 24 hours. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great for working moms
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, fits all my pumping supplies (Spectra S1) plus the side pocket fits my laptop and still has enough room for some misc work reports etc. I love this since I can carry one bag that will fit everything I need when I return to work. The bag is discrete, classy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: What a great bag! It's a nice large size with plenty of room for all of the things I need. I love that I can easily fit my breast pump in it with a lot of room left for diapers, bottles, wipes and toys. What's also great is that when I'm done needing it for baby purposes it will make an awesome travel bag. Sturdy and sleek. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great work bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am a new mom and was returning to work (a sales job) where I'm on the go a lot. I needed a bag to fit my work things, pump things, snacks, and a few baby things and still look profressional. I really like this bag, as is fulfills all of these things. The only thing to note is that it is BIG, but considering everything that needs to go on there, it needs to be big. I wear more navy than black, so I wish it came in navy but otherwise, love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making such an amazing bag!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, durable bag. Works perfectly for a combined purse and pump bag- so impressed how it can carry my pump and Kiinde cooler in their own compartments! I will be getting all my girlfriends one at their baby showers in the future. Thank you for making such an amazing bag!
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: This bag has made life so much easier. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag has made life so much easier. I can carry everything I need in one bag rather than lugging around a few different totes.
customer_reviews.author: Bkt0430

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this bag for a short while so far but I love it! I've already gotten a number of compliments on this bag from my girlfriends. It looks like an expensive designer bag but it's sold for a good price. I'd recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Lymor Ringer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The bag material itself is decent but the zippers are pretty cheap. I wouldn’t be surprised if the zipper broke within a few uses. Does the job but NOT worth $100.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zippers are kind of hard to zip up if the line is not perfectly straight.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Pilon

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It fits my pump and accessories, a coolor, my wallet, my phone, and my lunch. The only thing I wouls change is to add a place for my water bottle. Update; after a couple of months the top compartment sags.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: this bag works great for a diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Beyond carrying a pump, this bag works great for a diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Review

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: You won't be disappointed. I wanted a breast pump bag that was not obvious and that would fit in with professional dress for the workplace I got exactly what I wanted. It is functional and fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: meeshi kins

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this bag, it is very structured and has wonderful space/compartments. My only concern is that a few of the zippers are a little stiff. I am hoping that they will work better as I continue to use the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Merila

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Spectra pump fits great. Bag looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: MortarandAnvil

customer_reviews.title: Dislike this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay bag. The zippers are terrible and are hard to zip up. The bag looks prettier in pictures than it does in real life but it does the job. I like the two spots on the sides for the pump and cooler. Could have gotten a similar bag for cheaper. UPDATE: After 4 months of use, this bad is getting worse! The zippers STILL suck and now the bag is losing its shape and doesn't stand up like I used to. I hate this bag and wish I went with the Sarah Wells bag. I'm not sure I trust some of these super positive reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag has plenty of space for all of the things I need plus more.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan C

customer_reviews.title: Bag is both functional and good looking. Organizes all nursing supplies and makes pumping ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag is both functional and good looking. Organizes all nursing supplies and makes pumping easier especially when time at work is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Works great for taking pump to work. Enough room to fit all of my other stuff. Genius design.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeLover103

customer_reviews.title: Perfect back to work bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect back to work bag. Its really big but I like that about it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: The New Yorker Breast Pump Bag by Charlie G, Black/Gold (Mini)
product_meta.description:
Size:MiniABOUT CHARLIE G BAGS

Inspired by her daughter Charlotte, the company was founded in 2016 by Kristi Geronimo, a working mother who was looking for a better solution to her daily pumping schedule. Tired of carrying multiple bags that didn’t serve her purpose, she created the New Yorker specifically to serve as an all-in-one professional style tote that would blend in seamlessly in her professional and social circles. 

 
WHY THE NEW YORKER?

DESIGN - The intuitive layout allows for four separate compartments so you never lose your items in a bottomless bag again. Two insulated lower zipper accessed compartments for housing a portable breast pump and cooler. A large central upper compartment for storing additional personal and baby items. Oversized slide pocket to accommodate small lap, ipad or documents. 

 PREMIUM QUALITY - The New Yorker is made of 100% premium Cordura nylon, providing for an ultra durable and easy to clean bag. Additionally, the all-metal gold colored hardware and premium YKK zippers add style and sophistication while the oversized handles and 2” cross-body strap make this a dream to carry. 

 UNIVERSAL PUMP COMPATIBILITY - Designed to fit all portable mass market pumps, including Medela Pump in Style (with or without a case) and Freestyle, Hygeia, Freemie, Spectra, Ardo and Ameda. Can be carried over the shoulder by the large drop handles or cross-body utilizing the 2” oversized strap. 


100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

Our promise that you will be completely satisfied with the quality and functionality of the New Yorker. Buy with confidence and give a new mother the confidence to pump in style!
feature_bullets: BRAND NEW FOR 2018 - Professional designed, stylish tote bag with premium hardware and zippers. New "mini" size perfect for shorter trips.
UNIVERSAL PUMP COMPATIBILITY- Designed to fit all portable mass market pumps, including Medela Pump in Style (with or without a case) and Freestyle, Hygeia, Freemie, Spectra, Ardo and Ameda

DEDICATED COMPARTMENTS - Insulated individual lower compartments house your pump and cooler away from your other belongings. Large upper compartment and slide pockets keep personal and baby items orderly. No more losing your keys in a bottomless bag!
MOTHER INSPIRED AND DESIGNED - Designed by a mother specifically for the working professional. Classy and sophisticated design blends in seamlessly in any work or social environment.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Our promise that you will be completely satisfied with the quality and functionality of the New Yorker. Buy with confidence and give a new mother the confidence and
